definition: El Niño, equatorial climate variation in the Pacific
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
El Niño effect, equatorial climatic variation over the Pacific Ocean
pinyin: e4 er3 ni2 nuo4 xian4 xiang4

sentences.english: El Nino events increase probability that occurs the delayed cool injury.
sentences.chinese: 厄爾尼諾事件會增加延遲型冷害發生的概率。

sentences.english: A La Niña is essentially the opposite of an El Niño.
sentences.chinese: 拉尼娜本質上就是個相反的厄爾尼諾。

sentences.english: Dr Hsiang is not sure, however, that that connection has anything to do with El Niño.
sentences.chinese: 但向博士並不確定該相關和厄爾尼諾有任何聯繫。

sentences.english: Today, El Niñ os occur every 3 to 7 years on average, says Watanabe.
sentences.chinese: 渡邊剛說，現在厄爾尼諾現象每隔3至7年發生一次。

sentences.english: The variability has also been significantly modulated by ENSO forcings.
sentences.chinese: 大氣粉塵年際變率受到了厄爾尼諾現象的重要影響。

sentences.english: The current El Niño is forecast to last until the end of winter.
sentences.chinese: 當下的厄爾尼諾現象預計將持續到冬季結束。

sentences.english: El Nino usually lasts for about 18 months.
sentences.chinese: 厄爾尼諾現象通常會持續18個月。

sentences.english: Today, El Niños occur every 3 to 7 years on average, says Watanabe.
sentences.chinese: 渡邊剛說，現在厄爾尼諾現象每隔3至7年發生一次。

sentences.english: La Niñas and El Niños happen about every three to five years.
sentences.chinese: 拉尼娜和厄爾尼諾現象每三到五年時間就會發生一次。

sentences.english: El Ninos can push temperatures higher than they might ordinarily be.
sentences.chinese: 厄爾尼諾可以引起氣溫偏高。

sentences.english: La Nina and El Ninos happen about every three to five years.
sentences.chinese: 拉尼娜和厄爾尼諾現象每三到五年時間就會發生一次。

sentences.english: Caused by a major El Niño event.
sentences.chinese: 由於一次重大的厄爾尼諾事件而造成。

definition: asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
Europa (moon of Jupiter), aka Jupiter II
